action.description: From committee: Amend, and do pass as amended.Placed on General File.Read third time. Amended. (Amend. No. 718.)Reprinting dispensed with.Read third time. Passed, as amended. Title approved. (Yeas: 21, Nays: None.) To printer.From printer. To re-engrossment. Re-engrossed. Second reprint. To Assembly.
